text: Sissel is a 1986 album from Norwegian singer Sissel Kyrkjebø. It was her debut album which contained different genres and styles. According to her, "....The songs tell different facets of love."The official Sissel website. It was sold more than 400,000 copies soon after the release, making it the best selling album in Norway at that time, in a country with a population of 4.16 million (in 1986).Norway population. == Charts == {|class="wikitable sortable" border="1" !scope="col"|Chart (1986) !scope="col"|Peak position |- |Norwegian Albums ChartNorwegian Charts |style="text- align:center;"|1 |} ==Track listing== ===Norway version=== 01\. Kjærlighet 02\. Tenn et lys for dem 03\. Jeg trenger deg 04\. Summertime 05\. I ditt smil 06\. Eg ser 07\. Å Vestland, Vestland 08\. Vil du vekke tonen min? 09\. Inn til deg 10\. Frøet 11\. Det skal lyse en sol 12\. Dagen gryr ===Sweden version=== 01\. Kärleken 02\. Har en dröm 03\. Vem 04\. Tänd ett ljus 05\. In till dig 06\. Jag ser 07\. Det skall lysa en sol 08\. Summertime 09\. Å Vestland, Vestland 10\. Låt mej vara nära dej 11\. Dagen gryr ===Denmark version=== 01\. Vårvise (duet with Sebastian) 02\. Har en dröm 03\. Summertime 04\. Kärleken 05\. I ditt smil 06\. Jag ser 07\. Inn til deg 08\. Vil du vekke tonen min? 09\. Å Vestland, Vestland 10\. Rosen 11\. Det skall lysa en sol 12\. Dagen gryr ==References== Category:1986 debut albums Category:Sissel Kyrkjebø albums
